name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: I am a Senior Microsoft Engineer with over 9 years of extensive experience in managing and implementing critical infrastructure solutions leveraging **Active Directory**, **Azure AD**, **Windows Server**, **Microsoft Office 365**, **M365**, **Microsoft Intune**, **Azure Virtual Desktop**, and **PowerShell**. My expertise includes optimizing **Network Infrastructure**, ensuring robust **Disaster Recovery**, and implementing **Infrastructure Monitoring** systems. I excel in cross-functional team leadership and have a proven track record in mentoring junior engineers. Additionally, I focus on enhancing system accessibility and fostering technical excellence in projects that emphasize **ITIL** practices and utilize tools like **ServiceNow**. With experience in **AWS**, **VMware**, and **Hyper-V**, as well as strong skills in **Communications**, **VPN**, **Firewalling**, and **PC Imaging**, I am committed to delivering impactful and user-focused software solutions.
